akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title XXI, § 2193(b)(1), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 827

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 300c–21. Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title XXI, § 2193(b)(1), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 827
Section, act July 1, 1944, ch. 373, title XI, § 1131, as added July 29, 1975, Pub. L. 94–63, title VI, § 606, 89 Stat. 350; amended Aug. 1, 1977, Pub. L. 95–83, title III, § 306(b), 91 Stat. 389; Nov. 10, 1978, Pub. L. 95–626, title II, § 206(a), 92 Stat. 3584; Aug. 13, 1981, Pub. L. 97–35, title XXI, § 2193(a)(1)(D), 95 Stat. 827, related to comprehensive hemophilia diagnostic and treatment centers.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of 1981 Amendment and Repeal, Savings, and Transitional ProvisionsFor effective date, savings, and transitional provisions relating to the amendment and repeal of this section by Pub. L. 97–35, see section 2194 of Pub. L. 97–35, set out as a note under section 701 of this title.
